name: Cuteness Overload
description:
During his adventure, Beelzebub awakened the Cuties by mistake. It's time to clean the Temple from all this warmth and love!

- 13 levels filled with hearts and love

- An extraordinary maleficent power up

- A challenge that only the fastest can overcome

and more!

---

Hello there! I made this game to compete for a 1 dollar challenge. If you liked this game and want to support me, you can show me your support by donating!

If the concept is appreciated, I will work on a more elaborated sequel in this universe.

Anyway! Thanks a lot for checking out my game!

(You can check my ludum dare 38 game here: https://satalien.itch.io/holy-shit-a-spider)
